name: A Whole Lotta Room
description:
Kidnapped, thrown into a pit, and stranded on an unknown planet, you have to fight your way out. Waves of baddies will try to stop you, and you have to neutralise them and not perish. From time to time, Money-balls will be dropped and you have to shoot them to win the prize. Some help a lot, others a little, a few will set you free.

Press play, when dropped in the pit use WASD to move and left click to shoot. 

Good Luck and Have Fun!
